comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/66105333@N06] Wow, Danny, thanks for all of this wonderful information! I have amended her age to 42 above. Do you know that the Census Online has a facility for you to submit correct information? www.census.nationalarchives.ie/about/census_errors.html p.s. there must have been rampant "stretching" of the truth with regard to age in the census. Every day, people coming here to do family history research say of their ancestors: "But he couldn't have been that age because..."
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 14302637@N08
comment._content: One of her children was Michael Bishop of "The Happy Couple" www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland/6874578353/ He was 12 years old in the 1911 census, living in Michael Street, Waterford www.census.nationalarchives.ie/pages/1911/Waterford/Water...
